package.name: PDO_SQLITE
package.summary: SQLite v3 Interface driver for PDO
package.description: This extension provides an SQLite v3 driver for PDO. SQLite V3 is NOT compatible with the bundled SQLite in PHP 5, but is a significant step forwards, featuring complete utf-8 support, native support for blobs, native support for prepared statements with bound parameters and improved concurrency.

release.notes:
You need to install the PDO core module before you can make use of this one. You need to download and install SQLite V3 from http://sqlite.org to make use of this driver.
There is no windows binary available yet.
